name: has-symbols
description: Determine if the JS environment has Symbol support. Supports spec, or shams.

scripts.tests-only: npm run test:stock && npm run test:staging && npm run test:shams
scripts.test:shams: npm run --silent test:shams:getownpropertysymbols && npm run --silent test:shams:corejs
scripts.postversion: auto-changelog && git add CHANGELOG.md && git commit --no-edit --amend && git tag -f "v$(node -e "con
